mousse noun
(FOOD)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C/U ] a light food made from eggs mixed together with cream and other things, such as fruit, chocolate, or fish, and served cold: [ C ] a chocolate mousse
mousse noun
(BEAUTY SUBSTANCE)
[ U ] a light, creamy substance that is put on the hair or skin to improve its appearance or condition: styling/conditioning mousse
